snippet: Passion Star, a black transgender woman who has served 13 years in men’s prisons, was denied parole last week.
abstract: Black transgender woman Passion Star, who has served 13 years in men's prisons, is denied parole by Texas Board of Pardons and Paroles; Lambda Legal, which represents Star, says denial of parole is troubling given that her co-defendant, who is not transgender, was released two years earlier.
lead_paragraph: Passion Star, a black transgender woman who has served 13 years in men’s prisons, was denied parole last week.

headline.main: Texas: Parole Denied for Transgender Inmate

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund
